params.proposalId: ID of the proposal to activate
ID of the proposal to cancel

params.zkProofs: Array of ZK proofs for guardian identity verification

returns.success: True if payment was executed successfully

returns.activatedAt: Timestamp when current level was activated
returns.proposalId: ID of the active emergency proposal

params.proposalId: ID of the proposal to query

returns.isGuardian: True if address is a guardian

params.evidenceHash: Hash of the evidence for integrity

returns.proposalId: Unique identifier for the emergency proposal

params.newThresholds: Array of new approval thresholds [L1, L2, L3]

params.dataHash: Hash of original data for integrity
params.ipfsHash: IPFS hash of encrypted emergency data

params._gracePeriod: Owner response grace period (1 hour - 7 days)

returns.isValid: True if proof is valid for the guardian

params.level: Emergency level to check threshold for
params.messageHash: Hash of the message that was signed

adjustTimelockForRisk(address,uint256).notice: Adjusts timelock based on risk score (only if dynamic adjustment enabled)

cancelEmergencyProposal(uint256).notice: Cancels a pending emergency proposal (owner only)

checkAndAutoEscalate(bytes).notice: AI agent checks and auto-escalates if owner doesn't respond

executeGuardianChange(address[],uint256[.notice: Executes guardian configuration changes after timelock

executePaymentWithMultiSig((bytes32,addr.notice: Executes payment with enhanced multi-signature verification

getLevelSpecificTimelock(address,uint8).notice: Gets level-specific timelock for a user and emergency level

isGuardian(address).notice: Checks if address is authorized guardian

proposeEmergency(bytes,bytes32,bytes).notice: Proposes an emergency situation with evidence

setDynamicTimelockAdjustment(bool).notice: Enables or disables dynamic timelock adjustment based on risk scoring

setLevelSpecificTimelock(uint8,uint256).notice: Sets level-specific timelock for emergency levels

storeEncryptedEmergencyData(string,bytes.notice: Stores encrypted emergency data with IPFS integration

validateGuardianZKProof(bytes,bytes32,ad.notice: Validates guardian ZK proof for identity verification

verifyGuardianThreshold(bytes[],bytes32,.notice: Verifies guardian threshold for specific emergency level
